passage: While many video game creators strive to make their graphics ever more ______ blank others look to the past, developing titles with visuals inspired by the "8-bit" games of the 1980s and 1990s. (The term "8-bit" refers to a console whose processor could only handle eight bits of data at once.)
question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

answer_rationales.C: Choice C is the best answer. The convention being tested is punctuation between a subordinate clause and a main clause. This choice correctly uses a comma to mark the boundary between the subordinate clause ("While…lifelike") and the main clause ("others look to the past").
answer_rationales.A: Choice A is incorrect because it results in an incomplete sentence with no main clause.
answer_rationales.B: Choice B is incorrect because it fails to mark the boundary between the subordinate clause ("While…lifelike") and the main clause ("others…past").
answer_rationales.D: Choice D is incorrect because it results in an incomplete sentence with no main clause.
